casebody.data:
CATAWBA CNTY.
v.
LOGGINS. No. 152P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 25, 2016. J. David Abernethy, Attorney at Law, for Catawba County (by and through its Child Support Agency), et al. Blair E. Cody, III, Hickory, for Loggins, Jason. David W. Hood, Hickory, for Catawba County (by and through its Child Support Agency).

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of April 2016 by Plaintiff (Catawba County) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of April 2016."
